timeline.description: Leading the development of cloud-native applications and mentoring junior developers in best practices.
achievements: Architected and implemented a microservices platform reducing deployment time by 70%
Led the migration of legacy systems to modern cloud architecture

timeline.description: Developed scalable web applications focusing on real-time data processing and visualization.
achievements: Built real-time analytics dashboard processing 1M+ events/second
Implemented automated testing reducing bugs by 60%
Optimized database queries improving response time by 50%

timeline.description: Focused on building scalable backend services and API development.
achievements: Designed RESTful APIs serving 100K+ daily active users
Implemented caching strategy reducing server load by 40%
Created automated deployment pipeline saving 10 hours/week
